title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 87 Metacritic score and an 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76K votes. Created by Vince Gilligan (Breaking Bad) and features Rhea Seehorn on Apple TV.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: Highly anticipated HBO series based on Stephen King's 'IT,' boasting an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71K votes. Created by the Muschietti siblings, known for the successful 'IT' films.

title: Wonder Man
overview: Simon and Trevor, two actors at opposite ends of their careers, chase life-changing roles.
reason: A Marvel Studios production for Disney+, featuring Yahya Abdul-Mateen II. It has a solid 7.6 IMDb rating from over 12K votes, benefiting from the popular MCU brand.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor — who might be a murderer.
reason: A Netflix drama starring acclaimed actors Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys, achieving a 7.5 IMDb rating from over 21K votes. Its strong cast and platform contribute to its popularity.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: A Netflix series with a strong 7.9 IMDb rating from over 22K votes, featuring well-known actress Vera Farmiga. Its solid audience reception on a major streaming platform makes it popular.
